document.full_text: pakistani prime minister yusuf raza gilani's visit to china from tuesday allows islamabad to show it has another major power to turn to just as relations with the united states have faced intense strain after the killing of osama bin laden.
document.title: pakistan plays china card with prime minister's visit
lines_and_colors: pakistani prime minister yusuf raza gilani's visit to china from tuesday allows islamabad to show it has another major power to turn to just as relations with the united states have faced intense strain after the killing of osama bin laden.
